name: worble
description:
A Python clone remake of "Wordle" by Josh Warble @powerlanguish

--------------------------------------

Try and guess the word in 6 tries.

After entering a guess, the colour of the letters will signal how close you were.

  • Green  -  correct letter, correct position
  • Yellow -  correct letter, incorrect position
  • Black   -  incorrect letter, incorrect position

Happy worbling!

--------------------------------------

Features:

  • Daily worble
  • Free play
  • Win streak
